#### Beginner's Guide: Recreating "Deadest Names" Plot of FiveThirtyEight Using `ggplot2`

**Intro**: This is an R lab project from Data Science 1 of the master's program in biostats and data science at Weill Cornell, taught by [Dr. Elizabeth Sweeney](https://emsweene.github.io/index.html).  
**Goal**: In 1.5 hours, we'd like to reproduce a plot [Deadest Names published on FiveThirtyEight](https://fivethirtyeight.com/features/how-to-tell-someones-age-when-all-you-know-is-her-name/). You may find the original prompt [here](files/Lab_1_question.pdf).
